title: Stream: The Knife – Shaking The Habitual
body:
This April, **The Knife** release their first studio album since **_Silent Shout_** seven years ago.

The album, **_Shaking The Habitual_**, is now available to pre-order as a 2xCD, 3×12″ Vinyl and on iTunes. Having released the singles _A Tooth For An Eye_ and _Full Of Fire_, you can now stream the record in full below.

excerpt.full: This April, The Knife release their first studio album since Silent Shout seven years ago. The album, Shaking The Habitual, is now available to pre-order as a 2xCD, 3×12″ Vinyl and on iTunes. Having released the singles A Tooth For An Eye and Full Of Fire, you can now stream the record in full below.
